name: Boursin Cheese Pasta
description: This Boursin pasta is creamy, fragrant + ready in minutes with TWO ingredients. It's the perfect comfort food as a lunch, dinner, or side.
ingredients: 16 ounces pasta Penne or your favorite type
instructions: Bring a pot of water to a boil over high heat. Prepare pasta al dente. Drain pasta and return to pot. Over low heat, toss pasta with boursin to melt. Serve immediately. Optional: Garnish with fresh chives, basil, thyme or parsley.
